Game.Name: Tsuru Pika Hagemaru - Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi (Japan)
Game.plot: Tsurupika Hagemaru: Mezase! Tsuruseko no Akashi is an Action game, published by Jaleco Entertainment,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: Sound TestDuring gameplay, when you reach the polar bear quiz or the final boss battle with the singing girl, the game will await input at one point. Hold A and B on Controller 2, and then use Up or Down to change the music track and Left or Right to change the sound effects.
